About Me

Keshan is a Machine learning enthusiast with a computer science background. He founded Google Developer Groups in Sri Lanka back in 2009. Ever since he has been organizing/managing many events and created a 15 member community to 2000+ community in 5 years when he left GDG to join Google as the Country Engineering Consultant which he left in June 2018 after working closely with many teams across Google including Speech and language technology related teams where he authored 3 publications in Google related to speech technologies. Currently, Keshan is working on his own non profit organization called OpenData Sri Lanka where he is planning to build a research team around data science and machine learning while evangelizing open data concepts. Keshan has been a resource person and a speaker for GDG and many other technology events while evangelizing Googliness around Sri Lanka :).
